events.title: Dust Storm Approaching
events.description: A massive dust storm is heading your way. Visibility will drop to near zero. You could wait it out or push through.

choices.text: Wait it out (-1 day, -5 food, +10 morale)
Push through (-10 fuel, -15 morale, risk vehicle damage)

events.title: Abandoned Solar Station
events.description: You've found an abandoned solar charging station. Some equipment might still work, but it will take time to investigate.

events.title: Climate Refugee Convoy
events.description: Another convoy requests to join your group. They have 8 people but very low supplies. They could contribute skills but would drain resources.

choices.text: Share coordinates to safe zone (-5 morale)

events.title: Medical Emergency
events.description: A caravan member has fallen seriously ill. Without treatment, they could die, but using medicine will deplete your medical supplies.

choices.text: Try to reach medical depot (+1 day, -15 morale)

events.title: Vehicle Breakdown
events.description: One of your vehicles has broken down. You can attempt repairs with available tools or abandon it to continue faster.

choices.text: Attempt repairs (-10 medicine as parts, -4 hours)
